ship.description: The ship of the Black Cat Pirates, featuring a black cat figurehead

jollyRoger: A cat skull with a top hat

keyMoments.title: Black Cat Pirates Arrive at Northern Coast
keyMoments.description: The Black Cat Pirates arrive at Syrup Village's northern coast to begin their invasion as part of Kuro's master plan.
keyMoments.significance: The crew's invasion force lands and begins their assault on the village.

keyMoments.title: Battle Against Straw Hat Pirates Begins
keyMoments.description: The Black Cat Pirates engage in full combat with the Straw Hat Pirates on the northern slope of Syrup Village.
keyMoments.significance: Major battle engagement that will determine the fate of Syrup Village and Kaya.

goals: Execute Kuro's plan to steal Kaya's fortune
description: A pirate crew led by Captain Kuro, known for their strategic planning and ruthlessness. After Kuro faked his death, the crew has been operating under his three-year plan to steal Kaya's fortune through deception and murder.

jollyRoger: A skull wearing a straw hat

keyMoments.title: Discovery of Strategic Error
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates realize they defended the wrong beach and must race to the northern coast to intercept the Black Cat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Forces the crew to adapt quickly and shows the importance of accurate intelligence in battle.

keyMoments.title: Arrival at Northern Beach
keyMoments.description: Luffy and Zoro arrive at the northern coast to support Usopp in defending against the Black Cat Pirates' invasion.
keyMoments.significance: The crew unites at the correct battlefield to mount their defense.

goals: Protect Syrup Village from the Black Cat Pirates
description: The pirate crew led by Monkey D. Luffy, currently in its early formation with three members. They've allied with Usopp to defend Syrup Village from Captain Kuro's invasion.
